item.title: Ti Mapput Na Siguridát: Mina'Håcha
item.author: DJTai@pm.me (David J. Taitingfong)
item.content:encoded:
Håfa adai todus hamyu!

  1. Usa “DuckDuckGo”
    Siña un chagi lokkui': Qwant (France)

  2. Usa “Password Manager”
    Hu usa “BitWarden”, lao hu tungu' na bula na taotao ni' manusa 1Pass, KeePass? etc.

  3. Usa “2-Factor/Multi-Factor”

Yanggen la"dive-deep" i malago'-mu, pues siña un bisita PrivacyTools.

Todu ha' para på’gu. Bula guinaiya! — DJT.
item.dc:creator: David J. Taitingfong
